meta.content: Citizen engagement is the heartbeat of effective local government. Douglas County Colorado.

meta.name: tec-api-origin

div.p: In observance of the Labor Day holiday, all Douglas County Government offices will be closed Monday, Sept. 2, 2024.Â Offices will reopen on Tuesday, Sept. 3, for normal business. Many County services are available 24/7 by visiting online services.

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-home menu-item-1808

li.a: Ask a Question, Report Issues or Concerns

div.div: My Driver's License or Vehicle Registration
Register to Vote / Update Voter Registration

li.a: Ask a Question, Report Issues or Concerns

div.h2: Douglas County Government offices closed Sept. 2, 2024

div.p: In observance of the Labor Day holiday, all Douglas County Government offices will be closed Monday, Sept. 2, 2023.Â Offices will reopen on Tuesday, Sept. 3, for normal business.
Many County services are available 24/7 by visitingÂ online services. License plate renewal isÂ available onlineÂ orÂ at kiosks located throughout the County and state.

span.strong: Citizen engagement is the heartbeat of effective local government.

div.p: Protecting what we love about Douglas County.

div.p: Creating a community safety net for our most vulnerable citizens.

a.title: Learn how you can Live Wildfire Ready

h4.a: Learn how you can Live Wildfire Ready
h4.p: Whether youâre new to our state or a long-time resident, itâs important to know, that Colorado faces a ânew normalâ when it comes to wildfire. Ongoing dry and warmer temperatures elevate wildfire risk for Coloradans,…
Whether youâre new to our state or a long-time resident, itâs important to know, that…

a.title: More than $1 million in grants will help combat the impacts of the opioid epidemic in Douglas County

h4.a: More than $1 million in grants will help combat the impacts of the opioid epidemic in Douglas County
h4.p: Did you know that 39 of your Douglas County neighbors died from an opioid overdose in 2023? Thatâs more than double the number in 2022.* To combat this nationwide epidemic at the local level, the…
Did you know that 39 of your Douglas County neighbors died from an opioid overdose…

a.title: A hero never forgotten. Lucent Boulevard renamed Kendrick Castillo Way

h4.a: A hero never forgotten. Lucent Boulevard renamed Kendrick Castillo Way
h4.p: If you drive Lucent Boulevard in Highlands Ranch, youâll soon come to know it as Kendrick Castillo Way. As part of the ongoing mission to memorialize Kendrick â who was killed May 7, 2019, during…
If you drive Lucent Boulevard in Highlands Ranch, youâll soon come to know it as…
